group: xMods: volume panel: always show expanded
name: com.android.systemui.volume.VolumeDialogImpl-AlwaysExpand
author: intika
description:
Name:
Volume panel: always show expanded

@intikaa (telegram)

Hook Part: 
01/01

Description: 
This hook target only the package SystemUI, after enabling the group 'Intika-SystemUI-MoDs' you can enable the hook for the package 'SystemUI' and reboot.
This hook forces the volume panel/dialog to be shown always expanded.

Based on:

Links:
https://github.com/intika

Documentation:
https://github.com/M66B/XPrivacyLua/blob/master/DEFINE.md
https://github.com/M66B/XPrivacyLua/blob/master/tools/luaj_manual.html
https://github.com/LineageOS/android_frameworks_base/blob/lineage-18.1/packages/SystemUI/src/com/android/systemui/volume/VolumeDialogImpl.java
https://github.com/LineageOS/android_frameworks_base/blob/lineage-18.1/media/java/android/media/AudioSystem.java
https://github.com/GravityBox/GravityBox/blob/r/GravityBox/src/main/java/com/ceco/r/gravitybox/ModVolumePanel.java

Changelog:
v4: Needed hooks reduced to one
v3: Fix unexpand on volume change
v2: Additional hook and description update
v1: initial release
luaScript:
-- Intika-SystemUI-MoDs collection is a Lua hook set designed to work with XPrivacyLua.
-- Copyright (C) Intika

-- Intika-SystemUI-MoDs collection is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
-- it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
-- the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
-- (at your option) any later version.

-- Intika-SystemUI-MoDs collection is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
-- but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
-- MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- See the
-- GNU General Public License for more details.

-- You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
-- along with XPrivacyLua.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

function after(hook, param)
    local this = param:getThis()

    if this.mExpandRows ~= nil and this.mExpanded == false then
        this.mExpandRows:performClick()
    end

    log('Xprivacy expanded volume panel')
    return true
end
